動物用藥品名稱: 默之爾雞傳染性華氏囊病不活化疫苗
製造廠名稱: LOHMANN ANIMAL HEALTH INTERNATIONAL (MAINE BIOLOGICAL             LABORATORIES DIVISION)
效能(適應症): 種母雞：預防傳染性華氏囊病。
成分: THE BURSAL DISEASE VIRUS HARVEST IS MIXED WITH THE OIL ANDEMULSIFIERS AND EMULSIFIED.BAXENDALE STRAIN (10^6.2 TCID50/DOSE)MARYLAND STRAIN (10^5.8 TCID50/DOSE)DELAWARE VARIANT 1084A STRAIN (10^3.9 EID50/DOSE)
